Body.Content:
Updated April 4, 2024: We have updated the rollout timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 98328

When this will happen:

Standard Release: We will begin rolling out late January 2024 and expect to complete by late April 2024 (previously mid-March).

How this will affect your organization:

With this update users will now have visibility to additional meeting information within the calendar:

  • Live status of the meetings
  • Participant avatars in the call
  • Recording status
  • Meeting duration

What you need to do to prepare:

You may consider updating your training and documentation as appropriate.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Teams mobile will display live meeting status, participant avatars, recording status, and meeting duration. The rollout will begin in late January 2024 and end by late April 2024. Users may need to update their training and documentation.

Title: Agenda View Refresh in Teams Mobile
